settings.point1_description: Brew and steam at the same time and enjoy café-quality drinks in minutes.
settings.point2_description: Dual built-in scales powered by Espresso OS, no scooping and no guessing.
settings.point3_description: Takes the guesswork out of new beans and delivers the right grind and brew instantly.

settings.title:
Streamlined Workflow
On Screen
settings.description: Start-to-finish coffee experience, with Meraki delivering a seamless workflow in every cup.

settings.title: Café Performance, At Home
settings.description: Enjoy your daily coffee ritual elevated, with café-quality espresso and creamy milk made easy.

settings.text: "This is a real game-changer! And to be honest, it completely blew our minds the first time we tried it, because the espresso was just so on point."
"It rivaled the much more expensive machines I was used to working with at my coffee jobs, creating a nice layer of crema and extracting the floral notes of the coffee."
"This linear approach optimizes and simplifies your coffee-making 'workflow' while still preserving the artistry and authenticity of barista-crafted espresso."
